name: Clear the Graveyard (Ninus Hideon)
description:
Save the forest and the world by clearing a graveyard from zombies (the forest is not included in this build).

This was made for the DragonRuby Classics Jam: Gauntlet Edition. It is not the final game and I will make various modifications in the future. The name may change too.

For some reason the game runs too slow in the browser, and because of this for now it's only for download. I will try to optimize it later to play on browser.

All sounds used are from FreeSound (furter credits in-game).
